thread.title: Nikkei May Rise On U.S. Easy Policy Prospect, TPP Talk Progress
thread.title_full: Nikkei May Rise On U.S. Easy Policy Prospect, TPP Talk Progress - WSJ

author: Kosaku Narioka
title: Nikkei May Rise On U.S. Easy Policy Prospect, TPP Talk Progress
text: 2320 GMT [Dow Jones] Japanese stocks may rise as weak U.S. jobs data on Friday lowered speculation that the U.S. central bank will start raising rates this year, says Hideyuki Ishiguro, senior strategist at Okasan Securities. Under accommodative U.S. monetary policy, “it’ll be easier to take risks,” he says. Japanese stocks may also be buoyed by the news that officials from 12 countries around the Pacific are getting closer to a deal for the Trans-Pacific Partnership, he says. “There have been some expectations, but a final agreement would be a plus.” Still, there remain some sources of concerns. Saudi Arabia on...
